title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1.         Go to **Messaging** and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430134704415001.jpg).

2.         Enter the recipient and compose a message.

3.         Touch the menu key then **Add subject**. The message then changes to a multimedia message.

4.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430134704931002.jpg) to attach pictures, audio clips, or videos to the message.

5.         Select a SIM card to send the message.
